title: Swapping variable values with a and b

content.question:
A code segment will be used to swap the values of the variables a and b using the temporary variable temp.
Which of the following code segments correctly swaps the values of a and b ?

choices.label: Choice A has three boxes in a column.In choice A the top box reads a left arrow b, the middle box reads temp left arrow a, and the bottom box reads b left arrow temp.
Choice B has three boxes in a column. In choice B the top box reads temp left arrow a, the middle box reads a left arrow b, and the bottom box reads b left arrow temp.
Choice C has three boxes in a column. In choice C the top box reads temp left arrow a, the middle box reads a left arrow temp, and the bottom box reads b left arrow a.
Choice D has three boxes in a column. In choice D the top box reads temp left arrow a, the middle box reads b left arrow temp, and the bottom box reads a left arrow b.

content.answer: Choice B has three boxes in a column. In choice B the top box reads temp left arrow a, the middle box reads a left arrow b, and the bottom box reads b left arrow temp.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
